products.title: DuoShade White Dove PerfectFIT Thermal Blind
products.metadescription: This blind is not only ideal for bringing clean, uplifting brightness to a space, it has a whole bunch of tricks up its sleeve too!    The fabric itself is cleverly designed, with honeycomb pleats that trap the air and insulate the room, as well as deadening sound from outside. B

products.title: DuoShade White Dove PerfectFIT Thermal Blind
products.metadescription:
The perfectfit duoshade white dove is a funny one. In some lights its a stark white, in others it has undertones of the gentlest grey. One thing is for sure; its a wonderful shade.  
Its packed with practical benefits too. Its blackout, a great thermal barrier, a doddle to fi
